biotools.summary: ExPa (extreme pathways analysis) , a generating set for all possible steady state flux maps in a biochemical reaction network, can be computed from the stoichiometric matrix, an incidence-like matrix reflecting the network topology. ExPa compute these pathways.

bioschemas.name: ExPA
bioschemas.summary: ExPa (extreme pathways analysis) , a generating set for all possible steady state flux maps in a biochemical reaction network, can be computed from the stoichiometric matrix, an incidence-like matrix reflecting the network topology. ExPa compute these pathways.
